meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brendan Barnwell Scott Russell Bhibha Das Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6261.

td.p: Brendan Barnwell, a grad student and tutor from Santa Barbara, California
Scott Russell, a university chaplain from Blacksburg, Virginia
Bhibha Das, a postdoctoral research associate originally from Mt. Zion, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,201)

tr.td: INDIAN FOOD
AMERICAN NOVELISTS
(Alex: We'll give you the film. You give us the...)
MOVIE MODES OF TRANSPORT
PHRASES OF DEATH
MONOGRAMS IN FASHION
AMMAN, JORDAN

div.onmouseover:

(Alex: We\'ll accept--no, be more specific on that one.)
(Bhibha: What\'s a... um, [*]?
(Alex: That\'s better.)
(Bhibha: Okay.)
(Alex: Yes, that\'s exactly what our judges want.)
(Bhibha: That\'s--that\'s--okay.)

a herniated disk

Bhibha
')
